Package businessLayer

Class Management

java.lang.Object
businessLayer.Management
public class Management
extends java.lang.Object
Management.java - this complex Class contains all the Logic of the Applcation; For each line of requests, the Application will do the corresponding command;

  • Method Details

    • getStock

      public int getStock​(java.lang.String productOrdered)
      The method is used in order to find the total Stock for the ordered Product. We search the Product after its name;
      Parameters:
      productOrdered - : A variable of type String, representing the name of the Product;
      Returns:
      A variable of Integer data type, which represents the available number of the requested Product;

    • getCorrectPrice

      public double getCorrectPrice​(java.lang.String productOrdered)
      The method is used in order to find the correct Price for the ordered Product. We search the Product after its name;
      Parameters:
      productOrdered - : A variable of type String, representing the name of the Product;
      Returns:
      A variable of Double data type, which represents the correct price;

    • checkClient

      public java.lang.String checkClient​(java.lang.String orderingClient)
      The method is used in order to find if the ordering Client is registered and appears on the Client Report;
      Parameters:
      orderingClient - : A variable of type String, representing the name of the Client which placed the Order;
      Returns:
      A variable of String data type. If the Client is not registered the Order will not be processed;

    • getAddress

      public java.lang.String getAddress​(java.lang.String orderingClient)
      The method is used in order to find the Address attached to the ordering Client. This function helps the insertion into the Delivery SQL Table;
      Parameters:
      orderingClient - : the name of the client placing the Order;
      Returns:
      the String representing the Address of the found Client;

    • processLineClient

      public void processLineClient​(java.lang.String line)
      A method which takes all the possible cases available in the command lines regarding Clients and perform the specific task;
      Parameters:
      line - : A variable of String data type which represents the line we are computing;

    • processLineProduct

      public void processLineProduct​(java.lang.String line)
      A method which takes all the possible cases available in the command lines regarding Products and perform the specific task;
      Parameters:
      line - : A variable of String data type which represents the line we are computing;

    • processLineOrder

      public void processLineOrder​(java.lang.String line)
      The method presents the variables declared in the Order command. It checks them, and after that the Application will check the stock, the registration.
      Parameters:
      line - : A variable of String data type which represents the line we are computing;

    • processLineReportClient

      public void processLineReportClient​(java.lang.String line)
      The method treats the case in which the given command requests a PDF Clients Report;
      Parameters:
      line - : A variable of String data type which represents the line we are computing;
